about_the_game:
... to The Lost Hotel, a story-based pixel art game where you take on the role of a hotelier, tasked with saving the hotel from an endless time loop. Explore the hotel and interact with a diverse cast of characters, each with their own unique personalities and stories. Uncover secrets and solve puzzles as you work to unravel the mystery of the hotel's past.





Become the new hotelier by personalising your avatar, getting your special key and learning how to make every day a perfect day for your guests and staff!



From cooking and crafting, to managing and fixing electronics, you'll need to master a variety of skills to keep your guests happy and your hotel running smoothly.



As you explore the hotel, you'll discover that time is not on your side. The hotel is stuck in a time loop, and you'll have to unravel the truth behind the hotel's journey and its mysterious past by using your time wisely!



With a mix of exploration, puzzle-solving, management, and social interaction, The Lost Hotel offers an immersive and engaging gameplay experience with a touch of nostalgia from the pixel art graphics. Whether you're chatting with the eccentric hotel guests or uncovering hidden clues, there's always something new to discover in The Lost Hotel. Join us on this thrilling journey through space, as you work to not only keep the hotel running, but also uncover the secrets of the mysterious time loop.



Whether you master all the skills as quickly as possible in order to free the hotel and its guests - or whether you sit relaxed at the hotel bar and have a new conversation with the NPCs every time the time loop restarts - that's up to you!
